Text.Page: Prepare for a new mission by traveling to the Velika Outskirts. Help secure the supplies, then report to the airship dock.

[Seir]

My dear friend,

The Mysterium traced the recent demokron incursions to Northern Arun, and believe we can send a force to investigate.

You have never failed the Valkyon Federation, so I call upon you again to lend us your skill. Dougal will lead this mission, but he'll need someone tough to do the dangerous part.

We have developed a new airship called a Sky Ark. It will ferry your mission to the north. I need you to check on the supplies, then report aboard the sky ark.

Nari, down at the docks, is expecting you.

~Seir

Isn't it wonderful? So much bustle and activity!
What can I do for you?"Seir sent me to you."

I see. You're going north aboard the sky ark? That's great!

It's much more powerful than our normal airships.

Bound for Northern Arun and adventure! Doesn't it make your heart race?"Where exactly is this sky ark?"

See it there, hovering to the west?

Listen, the sky ark won't leave for the next couple of hours, but I could use some help."What do you need?"

We're coordinating supplies for the sky ark, but we've hit a few snags.

Lojemoon can put you to work. It's all for your new mission! Done talking.

A sight for sore eyes! If we don't get these supplies loaded, my fur will fall out!

The supply wagon left before we could get the emberbloom oil. Burns slow and doesn't smoke, which makes it ideal for airships."How much do you need?"

Not much! Not much!

See those sheep? They love to eat emberblooms. Pick a few flowers and bring them to me.

I'll do the rest.

Good, good. Those will do. A little squeeze....

Done! One crate, just like the quartermaster ordered.

Just one step left."Delivering it?"

Correct!

A trader named Tonas just left for the airship platform. His wagon's quite slow though, so you can probably catch up."That's all?"

Nothing more.

Thank you!
You don't have enough. Keep picking emberblooms.

I didn't see it. It just came out of nowhere and smacked my wagon.

The horses panicked and tore their harnesses free.

"Perhaps I can help."

I'm grateful, but the impact cracked my axles. I need to fix the wagon first.

The trouble is, I don't have anything to improvise for the repair."So you need wood?"

Yes! Those ghilliedhus or mycanars might do the trick, but not without a fight.

I need a handful of strong boughs. See what you can do while I find my tools.
Are they gone?<NEXTPAGEBUTTON>"Who?"</NEXTPAGEBUTTON>

These blasted bears attacked the wagon! They ate some supplies, cracked my seat, and made me soil my pants before my guards drove them off!

I need to make up for the lost food."Would bear meat do?"

Hah! It would indeed. Velik bless you!

Thank you, thank you so much!

You bring me some meat and I'll get these axles fixed.
I can't make repairs with less than five boughs. Can you get some more?

, you're the best!

I'll get this shipment to the airship dock and buy some new horses.

Thanks. May Velik guide you on your hunt!
Time is running out, soldier.
